trans-unit.source: Defines the type of events that are logged in an event log.
trans-unit.target: 定義事件記錄檔中所記錄的事件型別。

trans-unit.source: Each log can only contain one type of event.
trans-unit.target: 每個記錄檔只能包含一種事件型別。

trans-unit.source: These events are primarily for end users, administrators, and support.
trans-unit.target: 這些事件主要適用於使用者、系統管理員和支援人員。

trans-unit.source: The events that are found in the Administrative type logs indicate a problem and a well-defined solution that an administrator can act on.
trans-unit.target: 系統管理型別記錄檔中的事件表示問題，以及系統管理員可以執行的妥善定義方案。

trans-unit.source: An example of an administrative event is an event that occurs when an application fails to connect to a printer.
trans-unit.target: 舉例而言，當應用程式無法連接到印表機時所發生的事件，就是系統管理事件。

trans-unit.source: Events in an analytic event log are published in high volume.
trans-unit.target: 分析事件記錄檔中的事件會大量發行。

trans-unit.source: They describe program operation and indicate problems that cannot be handled by user intervention.
trans-unit.target: 它們會描述程式作業，並指出使用者操作所無法處理的問題。

trans-unit.source: Events in a debug type event log are used solely by developers to diagnose a problem for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 偵錯型別事件記錄檔中的事件只能由開發人員用來診斷問題以進行偵錯。

trans-unit.source: Events in an operational type event log are used for analyzing and diagnosing a problem or occurrence.
trans-unit.target: 作業型別事件記錄檔中的事件是用來分析及診斷問題或發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: They can be used to trigger tools or tasks based on the problem or occurrence.
trans-unit.target: 根據問題或發生的情況，它們可以用來觸發工具或工作。

trans-unit.source: An example of an operational event is an event that occurs when a printer is added or removed from a system.
trans-unit.target: 舉例而言，在系統中新增或移除印表機時所發生的事件，就是作業事件。
